workflows_description: Workflows are a series of actions that are automatically performed based on a trigger. They help you automate your work and save time. At the moment, workflows can only be created for decisions on Scenarios.
no_scenarios: Create a scenario to start creating workflows.
name: Name
workflow_type.create_case.tooltip: Add the decision matching the criteria to a new case
workflow_type.add_to_case_if_possible.to: Add the decision matching the criteria to an existing case or create a new case
trigger_node.decision_created.title: Decision created
trigger_node.decision_created.empty_cont: Select missing information to complete the configuration.
action_node.create_case.title: Add to a new case
action_node.create_case.empty_content: Select missing information to complete the configuration.
action_node.create_case.content: Create a new case in the inbox <Inbox>{{inbox}}</Inbox>
action_node.add_to_case_if_possible.empt: Select missing information to complete the configuration.
action_node.add_to_case_if_possible.cont: Add to an open matching case in the inbox <Inbox>{{inbox}}</Inbox>. If no matching case is found, a new case will be created.
detail_panel.no_selected_nodes.title: Workflow detail
detail_panel.no_selected_nodes.descripti: Select a node to see its details.
detail_panel.multiple_selected_nodes.des: You have selected multiple nodes. This panel doesn't show details of multiple nodes. Please select only one node to see details.
detail_panel.create_trigger_node.title: Choose a trigger
detail_panel.create_trigger_node.descrip: A trigger is an event that starts the workflow. Choose a trigger to start the workflow.
detail_panel.create_action_node.title: Choose an action
detail_panel.create_action_node.descript: An action is a task that the workflow performs. Choose an action to add to the workflow.
detail_panel.decision_created.descriptio: Triggered when a decision is created, that matches the following criteria.
detail_panel.create_case.description: Create a new case with the created decision. The case will be created in the selected inbox with a default name.
detail_panel.inbox.label: Inbox
detail_panel.inbox.need_inbox_contact_ad: Please contact your admin to create an inbox
detail_panel.create_case.default_name.he: The default name should follow this template:
detail_panel.add_to_case_if_possible.des: In the selected inbox, if an open case matches the decisionâ€™s pivot value, add the decision to it. If no matching case is found, a new case will be created with a default name.
detail_panel.add_to_case_if_possible.no_: You need to define a <DocLink>pivot value</DocLink> to add the decision to a case.
detail_panel.add_to_case_if_possible.def: If no matching case is found, the created case name should follow this template:
detail_panel.checklist.title: Checklist
detail_panel.checklist.description: Make sure all issues are resolved before saving the workflow.
detail_panel.checklist.error.global.miss: Add a trigger to start the workflow.
detail_panel.checklist.error.global.mult: Only one trigger is allowed in the workflow.
detail_panel.checklist.error.global.grap: Remove the loop in the workflow.
detail_panel.checklist.error.node.select: Select this node to see details.
detail_panel.checklist.error.node.invali: This step is not configured correctly.
detail_panel.checklist.error.node.not_co: This step is not connected to the trigger.
detail_panel.checklist.error.node.multip: This step has multiple outgoing connections.
detail_panel.checklist.error.node.missin: This step is missing an outgoing connection.
detail_panel.checklist.error.node.wrong_: This step is connected to a wrong node.
detail_panel.checklist.error.node.no_out: This step should not have an outgoing connection.
detail_panel.confirm_delete_workflow.des: Are you sure you want to delete this workflow?
